DIALOGUE.name: Juniper
message: These fiends... are far too strong for us.
I'm sorry my friends, looks like not only our lives, but our beloved home will cease to be

DIALOGUE.name: Ren
message: I'll miss your weird talk man...

DIALOGUE.name: Iris
message: *sobs*

DIALOGUE.name: Bravo
message: My beautiful face... I can't die looking ugly...

DIALOGUE.name: Siegfried
message: Can you stop? We don't want to kill you

DIALOGUE.name: Sebastian
message: This is just a huge misunderstanding
we're trying to save the forest, not ruin it.

DIALOGUE.name: Juniper
message: Wait
So you don't mean us harm?

DIALOGUE.name: Ren
message: Why didn't you say so before?
We wouldn't be wasting both our times here.

DIALOGUE.name: Robin
message: But we... nevermind

DIALOGUE.name: Juniper
message: But if you indeed are not enemies, what is your purpose?

DIALOGUE.name: Sebastian
message: We're on a mission to destroy whatever is causing this forest to corrupt.

DIALOGUE.name: Ren
message: Well, if that's the case, we'll gladly help you out
...Kinda. We're kinda bruised and tired from our little combat
Maybe not this guy. He got stamina to spare, he can help your fight no problem

DIALOGUE.name: Ren
message: It's settled then, we'll open the way and he'll fight alongside you guys

DIALOGUE.name: Iris
message: ...Good luck, I'm rooting for you...

DIALOGUE.name: Juniper
message: Bring down this beast, friends.
The forest counts on your struggle for victory!
